name: Seize Advantage
text: You can take advantage of your foes when they overcommit on their attacks.
benefit: When your foe is using Power Attack and you successfully use the opportune parry and riposte deed to parry its attack and then respond with a riposte, you add your foe’s current bonus on damage rolls from Power Attack to your own damage roll, but you do not take the penalty to hit from your foe’s Power Attack.
staminaText: When you make a riposte using this feat, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to increase the damage of the riposte by double the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 当你的敌人过度专注于攻击时，你可以利用这一点。
prerequisites_zh: 适时格挡反击炫技（opportune parry and riposte deed）。
benefit_zh: 当你的敌人使用猛力攻击，你成功使用了适时格挡反击炫技格挡了攻击并反击，把敌人当前在猛力攻击上的伤害加值应用到你的这次伤害检定上，而且你不需要承受敌人的猛力攻击对攻击检定的减值。
staminaText_zh: 当你在使用这个专长进行反击时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来提升反击的伤害，提升的伤害等于你消耗耐力的两倍。
